name: Sacrificial Fragments
r1: After dealing damage to an enemy with an Elemental Skill, the skill has a 40% chance to end its own CD. Can only occur once every 30s.
r2: After dealing damage to an enemy with an Elemental Skill, the skill has a 50% chance to end its own CD. Can only occur once every 26s.
r3: After dealing damage to an enemy with an Elemental Skill, the skill has a 60% chance to end its own CD. Can only occur once every 22s.
r4: After dealing damage to an enemy with an Elemental Skill, the skill has a 70% chance to end its own CD. Can only occur once every 18s.
r5: After dealing damage to an enemy with an Elemental Skill, the skill has an 80% chance to end its own CD. Can only occur once every 14s.
